column4: hello all! i'm using a thinkpad x61 tablet with gutsy, and can't modify my xorg.conf. every time i restart the x server, the xorg.conf gets overwritten. any thoughts on what i can do to prevent this from happening?
if you try to edit xorg.conf and it fails it will overwrite with the failsafe
aaah, so i'm just making errors in it? i'm trying to add the stylus stuff into xorg.conf, and its tried and true code, so i dont know why it would be failing
